description: Try our easy to follow Raspberry, Kiwifruit & Grapefruit Smoothie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Smoothie & frappé,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Egg free,Halal,High fibre,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat
name: Raspberry, Kiwifruit & Grapefruit Smoothie Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 50g frozen raspberries (plus extra to serve optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Peel and segment the grapefruit. Remove the skin and core from the pineapple. Juice the kiwifruit with the grapefruit and pineapple.
Transfer the juice to a food processor or blender, add the frozen berries and process until smooth.
Pour the smoothie into a glass, decorate with raspberries, if liked, and serve with a straw.
